sent.orig: A youngster shows off with bubble gum at a festival in Papua New Guinea.
sent.trans: 一个年轻的小女孩正在巴布亚新几内亚的一个集会上展示她的泡泡糖。

sent.orig: Ritchie a boisterous, likeable, well-built youngster, and he was a useful footballer.
sent.trans: 里奇是个脾气火暴的，可爱的，体格健壮的年轻人，也是个不错的球员。

sent.orig: The reactionary police fired on the crowd, wounding one youngster.
sent.trans: 反动警察向群众开枪，打伤了一个青年。

sent.orig: It is hard for an old man to work as long as a youngster.
sent.trans: 老年人要工作得和年轻伙子一样久是困难的。

sent.orig: Juventus youngster Raffaele Palladino has reiterated his intention to continue playing for the Old Lady.
sent.trans: 尤文图斯青年选手拉菲尔。帕拉迪诺重申了他将继续为贵妇人踢球。
